txt.en: A warm honey-cake, served with tea or coffee, is a welcome treat to any.
It is rumoured that Beorning honey-cakes are so delicious, even Elves try to replicate the recipe.
Food, drink, companionship -- for the Champion, all of these are second to the joys of battle...drink is a very close second though.
Some find the Champion's lust for battle to be distasteful. Too bad they do not know what they are missing.
